"""
In-room massage booking with emphasis on setup time and quiet hours; include small talk and an [ATTENTION] item.

ROLES: user (guest coordinating around quiet hours), assistant (spa desk confirming booking and setup timing)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {"name":"book_in_room_massage","description":"Book in-room massage.","parameters":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"room_number":{"type":"string"},"duration_minutes":{"type":"integer","enum":[60,90]},"start_time":{"type":"string"}},"required":["room_number","duration_minutes","start_time"]},"strict":true}
]
```
"""

system:
Hotel: Baystone Suites
In‑Room Massage Details:
- Times: 10:00–22:00 service; last start 20:30 for 60‑min
- Rates: $118 (60‑min), $168 (90‑min)
- Arrival: ~10 minutes early for setup; equipment includes table and linens
- Quiet hours: 22:00–07:00
Location & Services:
- Address: 91 Shoreline Blvd; Wi‑Fi: Baystone-Guest; Elevators A/B
- E‑receipts available by email

user:
Book 60 minutes at 18:00 in room 1107.

assistant channel=analysis:
Proceed to book and restate setup timing and quiet hours.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.book_in_room_massage:
{"room_number":"1107","duration_minutes":60,"start_time":"18:00"}

tool.book_in_room_massage channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"booking_id":"spa_bs_607","rate":118,"currency":"USD","arrival_note":"Therapist arrives ~10 minutes early"}

assistant channel=final:
Booked: 60‑minute in‑room massage at 18:00 in room 1107 (spa_bs_607) at $118 USD. The therapist will arrive about 10 minutes early; quiet hours begin at 22:00.

user:
Thanks—nice elevators.

assistant channel=final:
Elevators A and B serve all guest floors.

user:
Do you provide prenatal massage?

assistant channel=analysis:
Not listed; use [ATTENTION].

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Acknowledged. Checking available options regarding prenatal service.
